mapper.update: update notice set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, public_time = #{publicTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, aritle = #{aritle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source_department = #{sourceDepartment,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, title, author, public_time, aritle, source_department, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time from notice where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, title, author, public_time, aritle, source_department, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time from notice
